nodes.bodyText: Please rename these transformation files to dwdunwetter_severity_de.map as it contains German mappings.
Please rename these transformation files to dwdunwetter_urgency_de.map as it contains German mappings.

We should amend a mapping for UNDEF too:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            NULL=undefiniert
          
          
            
            NULL=undefiniert
          
          
            
            UNDEF=undefiniert
